00019 #include "mscms.h"
00020 
00021 BOOL WINAPI
00022 DllEntryPoint(
00023     HINSTANCE hInstance,
00024     DWORD     fdwReason,
00025     LPVOID    lpvReserved
00026     )
00027 {
00028     switch (fdwReason)
00029     {
00030     case DLL_PROCESS_ATTACH:
00031         //
00032         // Not nessesary to call me for DLL_THREAD_ATTACH and DLL_THREAD_DETACH
00033         //
00034         DisableThreadLibraryCalls(hInstance);
00035         InitializeCriticalSection(&critsec);
00036         break;
00037 
00038     case DLL_PROCESS_DETACH:
00039         DeleteCriticalSection(&critsec);
00040         break;
00041 
00042     default:
00043         break;
00044     }
00045 
00046     return(TRUE);
00047 }
